front.title: IEEE Standard for a Real-Time Operating System (RTOS) for Small-Scale Embedded Systems
front.abstract: A real-time operating system (RTOS) called Î¼T-Kernel for small-scale embedded systems such as systems with a single chip microcomputer including 16-bit CPUs, systems with a small amount of ROM/RAM, and systems without a memory management unit (MMU) are specified in this standard.
